item.title: Live updates: Trump says of Texas flood damage, ‘I’ve never seen anything like this’
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s second term in the White House and the Republican-led Congress.

item.title: Trump says he and Melania met with Texas flood victims’ families
As people gather near where Trump toured, one said ‘No taxation without FEMA’
State Department fires more than 1,300 employees in downsizing plan
item.description: The move has drawn criticism from current and former diplomats who say the cuts will degrade America’s standing in the world and curb U.S. soft power.
